Injured on 8/28/1972 with a Broken Hand, out for 7 weeks...
Released by Baltimore on 4/26/1979...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/10/1980 to a 2-year deal worth $1,740,000 per year...
Released by Cleveland on 6/2/1980...
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Baltimore in 1985...

Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...

Hit for the cycle against Oakland on 6/23/1994...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
